text: Virineya () is a 1968 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Fetin.Утонченная и элегантная: 75 лет Людмиле ЧурсинойВИРИНЕЯ It stars Lyudmila Chursina, Vyacheslav Nevinny, and Anatoliy Papanov. == Actors == * Lyudmila Chursina as Virineya * Vyacheslav Nevinny as Pavel Sluzov * Anatoliy Papanov as Maraga * Valentina Vladimirova as Anisya * Oleg Borisov as Vasily * Stanislav Chekan as Zhiganov * Yevgeny Leonov as Mikhailo == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1968 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Virineya
